name: Christmas bridge - Bridge construction simulator
description:
We present to your attention a series of games dedicated to the construction of bridges. Popular game "Railway bridge" has its continuation in a new physical game "Bridge Christmas."
Action games "Christmas Bridge" occur at the North Pole. We tried to create in-game themed atmosphere. The game combines graphics and music corresponding to a given topic.
In order not to disrupt Christmas, you need to be on time to build all the bridges. Building bridges in a bustle of Christmas - not an easy task. The ice drifts, Christmas gifts and many other obstacles to builders. But for those who like to build and design the bridges, as well as loves Christmas puzzle game "Bridge Christmas" like.
Build bridges - responsible business. In this game, everything is also based on the physical load on the different materials. Knowledge of the physical properties of these materials and pavements will be useful for our builders, even at the North Pole. The reliability of the constructed bridge depends on whether you pass the entire route, and will not break if the truck with gifts to open. This as you can imagine can rip and Christmas itself. You will find a lot of dangers on the road, as well as an exciting journey that will absorb you for a long time.
In this puzzle game simple operation. Christmas will be a pleasant interface and intuitive for children and adults. Find your way and build a bridge that will help pave the way forward to new adventures.
Try to get past the first level, and you will see that this is not enough, and all the fun is waiting for you ahead.
The game will entice and boys and girls. Parents themselves can play, compete with the children, who will pass more levels.
Bored on the way to school or work? Are you waiting for friends who are late? Maybe you're stuck in a "traffic jam"? Or, your turn will not be in the near future? Take a fascinating game. Game Christmas bridge will take you to the wonderful world of games. New levels are waiting for you.

Download now!

Play anytime and anywhere!

Enjoy!

Thanks for the good ratings and reviews!

Happy New Year and Merry Christmas !!!
